mapper.select: select m.institution_id, m.agent_id, m.parent_id, i.cn_name as ext5, m1.cn_name as ext6, m2.cn_name as ext7, m.agent_type, m.id, m.cn_name, m.en_name, m.country_type, m.country as country, m.mcc, m.region as region, m.merchant_type, m.group_master_account, m.develop_sales, m.company_regist_number, m.company_validity, m.legal_passport_code, m.legal_passport_validity, co.area_code as country_code, m.institution_adress, m.legal_passport_img, m.institution_contract, m.company_articles, m.business_certificate, m.institution_phone, m.legal_name, m.business_category, m.business_license, m.industry_category, m.merchant_postal_code, m.merchant_email, m.merchant_web_url, m.contact_address, m.contact_people, m.contact_phone, m.audit_status, m.merchant_logo, m.ext7, m.ext6, m.ext5, m.ext4, m.ext3, m.ext2, m.ext1, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.creator, m.modifier, m.remark, m.enabled from merchant m left join institution i on m.institution_id = i.id left join merchant m1 on m.agent_id = m1.id left join merchant m2 on m.parent_id = m2.id left join country co on m.country = co.extend1 and co.language = #{language} left join country c1 on m.region = c1.extend1 and c1.language = #{language} where m.id = #{id}
select id, cn_name, enabled, institution_id, merchant_logo, merchant_type from merchant WHERE id = #{code}

select m.id, m.institution_id, m.agent_type, m.agent_id, m.parent_id, m.cn_name, m.en_name, m.country_type, m.country, m.region, m.mcc, m.merchant_type, m.group_master_account, m.develop_sales, m.company_regist_number, m.company_validity, m.legal_passport_code, m.legal_passport_validity, m.country_code, m.institution_adress, m.legal_passport_img, m.institution_contract, m.company_articles, m.business_certificate, m.institution_phone, m.legal_name, m.business_category, m.business_license, m.industry_category, m.merchant_postal_code, m.merchant_email, m.merchant_web_url, m.contact_address, m.contact_people, m.contact_phone, m.audit_status, i.cn_name as ext1, c.extend2 as ext2, mccChannel.code as ext3, m.ext4, m.ext5, m.ext6, m.ext7, m.enabled from asianwallets_saas.merchant m left join asianwallets_saas.institution i on m.institution_id = i.id left join asianwallets_saas.country c on m.country = c.extend1 and c.language = "zh-cn" right join asianwallets_saas.mcc mc on m.mcc = mc.code right join asianwallets_saas.mcc_channel mccChannel on mc.id = mccChannel.mid and mccChannel.cid = #{channelCode} where m.id = #{merchantId}
